Object.Name: Vehicle Counter
Object.Description1: This custom object is used to represent some details of a vehicle counter. A vehicle counter detects the entry or exit of a vehicle on a certain parking lot using some type of sensor (could be a camera with ALPR or detection cycle in the road.

Item.Name: Vehicle Counter ID
Item.Description: Identity of the vehicle counter, based on the host name. When multiple LwM2M clients run on the same host, used a "-N" sequence number to make the distinction.

Item.Name: Vehicle Counter
Item.Description: The number of vehicles that passed this vehicle detector.

Item.Name: Last Plate
Item.Description: If the detector is based on a camera with ALPR, the last detected license plate is provided in this resource.

Item.Name: Direction
Item.Description: If the detector is based on a camera with ALPR, the last detected license plate is provided in this resource.

Item.Name: Lot Name
Item.Description: The name of the parking lot where the vehicle counter belongs to. The value is non-volatile, such that a restart will result in registering at the related parking lot server.
